mapper.select: SELECT topic.topic_id, topic_name, max_person, end_time, topic_type, choice_state, teacher.id, college, uname FROM topic LEFT JOIN choice ON topic.topic_id = choice.topic_id LEFT JOIN teacher ON topic.id = teacher.id LEFT JOIN user ON teacher.id = user.id WHERE choice.id = #{student_id} and (choice_state = 1 or (choice_state = 0) -- and end_time > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) )

SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(*) FROM topic LEFT JOIN teacher ON topic.id = teacher.id LEFT JOIN user ON teacher.id = user.id WHERE topic.end_time > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP and topic.max_person > ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM choice as c WHERE c.choice_state = 1 and topic.topic_id = c.topic_id )
and topic.topic_id not in ( SELECT c.topic_id FROM choice as c WHERE c.id = #{student_id} )

SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(*) FROM topic LEFT JOIN teacher ON topic.id = teacher.id WHERE topic.id = #{search.teacher_id}
and not (topic.max_person > ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM choice as c WHERE c.choice_state = 1 and topic.topic_id = c.topic_id ))
and topic.max_person > ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM choice as c WHERE c.choice_state = 1 and topic.topic_id = c.topic_id )
and topic.topic_name like concat('%', #{search.topic_name}, '%')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM choice WHERE choice.topic_id = #{topic_id} AND choice.choice_state = 1
